item.title: Motivic spectra and universality of $K$-theory
item.description: arXiv:2204.03434v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We develop a theory of motivic spectra in a broad generality; in particular $\mathbb{A}^1$-homotopy invariance is not assumed. As an application, we prove that $K$-theory of schemes is a universal Zariski sheaf of spectra which is equipped with an action of the Picard stack and satisfies projective bundle formula.
item.dc:creator: Toni Annala, Ryomei Iwasa
